extendedInfo.description: Access the Mid-Continent Public Library from your Android device! The mymcpl app makes it easy to discover library materials, place holds, view your account, find your local branch, and keep up with all the events at any MCPL location! Mid-Continent Public Library has over 30 locations in the Greater Kansas City Metro Area.Features:    * Discover books, movies, music, and more in our online catalog.    * Check our calendar for storytimes, classes, and events for all ages.    * Access hundreds of research databases for school, work, and play.    * Read updated Library news.    * Check out Library materials directly from the shelf.    * Find MCPL locations, hours, and maps.    * View any charges, fees, or fines.    * Renew items.    * Use our Ask a Librarian service to receive quick answers.    * Scan an itemâs ISBN and receive details and reviews of any book, CD, or DVD.    * Place holds on current and soon to be released titles.    * Search the collection by title, author, subject, or keyword.    * Check a titleâs availability and current location.    * Manage, cancel, and suspend holds.    * Browse reading lists and new materials.    * Contact Library staff.Mid-Continent Public Library is the largest library system in the metropolitan area, operating 33 libraries and serving over 750,000 people in Jackson, Clay, and Platte counties. The Library strives to provide exceptional customer service and expanding access to materials, programs, and technology including a world class genealogy and family history library. For more information, visit mymcpl.org.For app concerns, problems, feedback, and questions please contact the Library at info@mymcpl.org.

reviews.title: Missing a lot
reviews.comment: No access to Overdrive wishlist. No browsing Overdrive books. Only in-stock Epub books listed. (No Kindle listings at all.) Current checkouts & holds incorrect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not so good since the update
reviews.comment: Since the update it is nearly impossible to to do anything.  Everything is so slow.  I am not sure if it is just the app though because the,website is the same way.  Please change it back!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I am disappointed
reviews.comment: I\'m disappointed in this apps because it doesn\'t have worldcats. If I want to order a movie or book, but mid continent lib don\'t have it. then I try to find worldcats and apps don\'t have it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great access
reviews.comment: I love how this gets me access to my favorite library resources. Well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love easily and quickly downloading books to my kindle app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Android Ap
reviews.comment: It is much better than the site, IMHO.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost useless if you\'re a Kindle user.
reviews.comment: The app itself works well as long as you aren\'t a Kindle user. The app only lists Epub books and does not list Kindle books. The sign in for the app is clunky which to be honest matches the clunky sign in for the library\'s online website. Will work for people who are checking out regular books or who use Epub but if you\'re a Kindle user you\'re not going to find this useful for you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I\'m always on there web site now I can access it much easier now!
reviews.author: A Google User
